title: Billy Brunch
knownFor: Breakfast all day, every day - open 365 days
description: Brunch classics served all day: eggs Benedict, pancakes, bagels, and more. Open 365 days a year, 9:30am-5pm. Affordable prices (€5-10). Excellent food, service, and atmosphere. Highly rated (4.9/5 with 980+ reviews).
